Name: Abstractanks
About the game: Abstractanks is an action-packed real-time-strategy game with an abstract neon theme. Play intense multiplayer skirmishes with up to 16 players or AIs. Beat the short, handcrafted single-player campaign and master tough optional challenges . Capture spawn circles to quickly produce hundreds of units . Use your map-control to collect and unleash game-changing power-ups . Switch the only unit type between damage- and utility-mode. Climb the leaderboards on procedurally generated maps in the endless horde mode. Freely shape your units into any formation or split units with simple and intuitive controls.
